text:
In honor of #FlavonoidFriday >> Quick Read: Silymarin Research > https://t.co/VqJkl3stkL

"Silymarin is a #flavonoid that is produced by milk thistle and #cannabis, among other plant species. It has been shown, via scientific #research, to offer anti #cancer properties." https://t.co/HO8UV9pu0e
